Package search.management

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dataset
    Represents a ESGF Dataset of a Output Climate Model.
    DatasetFile
    Represents a ESGF File of Output Climate Model Dataset.
    DatasetMetadataCollector
    Dataset metadata collector.
    Facet
    The Facet class represents ESGF RESTful service facets.
    Parameters
    The Parameter class represents ESGF RESTful service keywords and facets Keywords parameters are query parameters that have reserved names, and are interpreted by the search service to control the fundamental nature of a search request: where to issue the request to, how many results to return, etc.
    ParameterValue
    Public class that represents a pair parameter - value.
    Record
    Represents a record returned by RESTful search.
    RecordReplica
    Represents a replica of a ESGF Record of a Output Climate Model.
    RESTful
    The RESTful class is a abstract class that represents the structure of ESGF RESTful API.
    RESTfulSearch
    The RESTfulSearch class extends RESTful, to implement search functionality.
    RESTfulWget
    The RESTfulSearch class extends RESTful, to implement wget functionality.
    SearchCategoryValue
    Public class that represents a faced value, with facet value datasets count and state (selected or not)
    SearchManager
    Manages the search of Datasets in ESGF by setting parameters of RESTfulSearch Always search all versions and all replicas because some index node have more metadata indexed tan others.
    SearchResponse
    Class that represents the response of a search.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Format
    To specify the response document output format .
    Latest
    Enum values of parameter "Latest" latest, previous or all versions.
    Metadata
    The Metadata Enum class lists each of the possible metadata defined by ESGF.
    Parameter  
    RecordType
    Enum that list all intrinsic type of the record.
    Replica
    Enum values of parameter "Replica" master, replicas or all replicas.
    SearchCategoryFacet
    Facets supported by most ESGF Index Nodes in the federation, and can be used to discover/query/retrieve CMIP5 data.
    Service
    Lists the services offered by ESGF for access to data.
